divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my car driving east when i came to an intersection and stopped there to make a left turn. while stopped i noticed a spherical object moving across the sky from north to south slowly at maybe 45 degrees above the horizon. i thought to myself,"what is that?" as i continued to observe the object i did not think it was a ufo, i simply tried to figure out what it was and i could not fit it into any familiar category that i knew of. i thought perhaps it is a bird, but as i kept looking i could not detect any head or wings or feet or tail. it appeared as a distinct sherical object moving at a steady pace, not fast. the side of the object that was towards the sun was very shiny like polished metal. the side away from the sun looked dull greyish. at this point i could not tell how far away it was or how high. then i saw a large bird in the sky that appeared to be a hawk or a buzzard, or some other large bird. this bird then began flying towards the object as if to check it out. when the bird appeared to be about two feet or so away from the object, the bird abruptly turned away at about a ninty degree angle and flew away and did not return. this gave me an idea of the size of the object, and about how far away it was, by comparing the wingspan of the bird. the object appeared to be very near, and perhaps 200 feet in the air(this is merely a guess) it is hard to estimate the height. even at this stage, i did not think i was seeing a ufo, i was just trying to figure out what it was. i've seen balloons in the sky, and this did not look like that. balloons usually seem to rise, this object moved laterally. also, it was very shiny. I had to go ahead and make my left turn, so i lost sight of it as i turned north. it was at this point that it hit me how odd this was, i had never seen anything even close to this. at he next block i turned around to go back and see if was still visible. this took probably little over a minute. but when i got back there was nothing to see. I then remembered video i had seen on tv of sightings in mexico i think of shiny spherical objects, and what i saw was identical to those videos. later in the day when i thought about it, i felt that it was strange that i did not get excited or afraid when i was seeing this. it was like i had suspended judgement and was merely an observer. as i left the scene of the sighting, i went about my business running some errands and then went to work. i didnt even think about it for a while, until i was at work and i told some people about it. they were all skeptical. i cannot say what it was i saw, but it was so distinct of an object, not fuzzy, or in the sun, or obscurred in any way. it was as plain as day.
Summary: spherical shape about two or three feet diameter moving slowly from north to south
